newsitem.title: USA: First of America sees gain from Fla. sale.
newsitem.headline: First of America sees gain from Fla. sale.

text.p: First of America Bank Corp said Monday that it expects a gain of about 14 cents a share on the sale of its Florida franchise to Barnett Banks.
The $160 million sale was expected to be completed during the third quarter of this year, subject to regulatory approval, First of America said.

"While we have made progress in generating profits in Florida, we have set our highest strategic priority on the performance of our operations in the Midwest," Richard Chormann, First of America's chairman, president and chief executive officer said in a statement.
